author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Retrieve a list of User-Defined Suspicious Objects from the Apex One Central server.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-usdo-list

commands.description: Add suspicious file, file SHA-1, IP address, domain, or URL objects to the User-Defined Suspicious Object list.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-usdo-add

commands.description: Delete suspicious file SHA-1, IP address, domain, or URL objects from the User-Defined Suspicious Object list.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-usdo-delete

commands.description: Retrieve a list of User-Defined Suspicious Objects from the Apex One Central server.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-udso-list

commands.description: Add suspicious file SHA-1, IP address, domain, or URL objects to the User-Defined Suspicious Object list.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-udso-add

commands.description: Delete suspicious file SHA-1, IP address, domain, or URL objects from the User-Defined Suspicious Object list.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-udso-delete

commands.description: Isolate an agent from the network
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-isolate

commands.description: Restore an isolated agent connection to the network.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-restore

commands.description: Retrieves a maximum of 1000 logs of detection types from the server. The `Pattern Update Status` and `Engine Update Status` log types returns all logs (no maximum) from the specified "since_time". In some cases the command might return alerts that were created before the specified time. This is a known issue with the API.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-list-logs

commands.description: Adds the uploaded file information to the User-Defined Suspicious Objects list. If the file already exists, it will be updated with the new arguments.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-udso-file-add

commands.description: Retrieves a list of managed product servers reporting to Apex One Central.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-managed-servers-list

commands.description: Retrieves a list of Security Agents.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-security-agents-list

commands.description: Retrieves a list of Security Agents with the Endpoint Sensor feature enabled.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-endpoint-sensors-list

commands.description: Creates a new historical investigation on all Security Agents with Endpoint Sensor enabled using the specified criteria, search operator, and match condition.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-historical-investigation-create

commands.description: Retrieves a list of all investigation results.
commands.name: trendmicro-apex-investigation-result-list

integration.description: Trend Micro Apex One central automation to manage agents and User-Defined Suspicious Objects
integration.name: Trend Micro Apex One

playbook.description:
This playbook blocks domains using Trend Micro Apex One.
The playbook checks whether the Trend Micro Apex One integration is enabled, whether the Domain input has been provided and if so, blocks the domain.
playbook.name: Block Domain - Trend Micro Apex One

description: Trend Micro Apex One central automation to manage agents and User-Defined Suspicious Objects
name: Trend Micro Apex One
